title: Balaji - Two gods with the same name?
selftext:
I have long realized that Hindu gods and godesses have different names in different parts of the country, but the other day I was bowled over when a cousin said he was going to *Mehandipur Balaji Temple* for Hanuman. 

I had always thought Balaji was synonymous with Venkateswara (and even [Wikipedia concurs](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Venkateswara) )- "The deity is referred to as 'Balaji' by north Indians." Balaji also happens to be a common first name for boys/men in the South. 

And then there is Balaji in the form of 'Bala' Hanuman. 

Wonder if there are other similar gods and goddesses' names I am not aware of?
comments: I wonder what Balaji chips are named after?
The founder's favorite grandson named Balaji ;-)
